mapper.select:
select @rownum := @rownum+1 as rn, p_bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, replycnt from jdongsu_db.photo_gallery, (select @rownum:=0) A
order by rn desc limit #{offset}, #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into photo_gallery (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update photo_gallery set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updatedate = now() where p_bno = #{p_bno}
mapper.select:

p_bno > 0
